Finding rocks

Artem V. Shamsutdinov July 3nd, 2022

I, as everybody, fear Doomsday stuff. Not the stuff that certainly we won't have any control of for a long time, like sun getting hotter or being in a range of a supernovae. But the well known asteriod impact scenario.

Parking rocks

Artem V. Shamsutdinov July 4th, 2022

Building asteroid detection networks is a very large and expensive undertaking. And while I might be motivated enough to make it my life's work, it will be hard for the planet to get going on this, simply because nobody knows if and when an asteroid will strike. But there other factors to motivate us to get this done sooner rather than later.
